definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation (MOFTEC)
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Mao4 yi4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 bu4

sentences.english: The part of 3th discusses the role of the theory of comparative advantage for Chinese foreign trade .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分论述了比较优势理论对中国对外贸易的作用。

sentences.english: The war brought all foreign trade to a standstill .
sentences.chinese: 战争使所有的对外贸易停顿下来了。

sentences.english: Industry and trade with foreign countries became prosperous, woolen cloth was on sale in European countries.
sentences.chinese: 城市手工业和对外贸易都相当繁盛，呢绒行销欧洲。

sentences.english: China´s external trade is steadily becoming more balanced.
sentences.chinese: 中国的对外贸易稳步发展，日益均衡。

sentences.english: Shifang changjiang foreign trade co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 什邡长江对外贸易公司。

sentences.english: Abstrac: The Cohong is the product of opening trade policy of Qing government.
sentences.chinese: 行商是清政府对外贸易政策的产物。

sentences.english: Sinuiju in the port merchants to promote foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 港口商贾在义州促进了对外贸易。

sentences.english: This is the history of China's first specialized in foreign trade regulatory body.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国历史上第一个专司对外贸易的管理机构。

sentences.english: Foreign-Trade Zones are considered outside the territory of the U. S. for customs purposes.
sentences.chinese: 对外贸易区被看作是美国海关权责范围之外的区域。

sentences.english: The US needs to cut its trade deficit, China its surplus.
sentences.chinese: 美国需要削减他的贸易逆差，中国则对外贸易过剩。

sentences.english: Article 58 The State supports and facilitates small and medium-sized enterprises to develop foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 第五十八条国家扶持和促进中小企业开展对外贸易。

sentences.english: Our gain from foreign trade is what we import.
sentences.chinese: 对外贸易中我们所得的部分即为进口。

sentences.english: Corporation at the port of destination.
sentences.chinese: 的口岸的对外贸易运输公司分公司。

sentences.english: At that time, the Thirteen Hongs Street became the center of foreign trade on Chinese tea.
sentences.chinese: 广州十三行街成为当时中国茶叶对外贸易的中心。

sentences.english: Relatively rapid growth was registered in foreign trade and foreign capital utilization was improved in quality.
sentences.chinese: 对外贸易增长较快，利用外资的质量得到提高。

sentences.english: The fact is, Hong Kong is very much an externally-oriented economy.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，香港经济主要倚赖对外贸易。

definition: having trading relations (of nations or regions)
treaty port, forced on Qing China by the 19th century Great Powers
